snippet: MANDELKER--Philip, 69, died on Monday, April 25, 2016, of complications following a liver transplant. The funeral took place in Tel Aviv. Loving and beloved husband of Edna (nee Gil), extraordinary father of Nir and Inbal, devoted son of Evelyn (nee Ostow) and the late Benjamin, dear brother of Ronne Braiterman, and cherished friend. Philip was a brilliant attorney, successful businessman, Major in the Israel Defense Forces, philosopher, artist, and lover of life. Graduate of Columbia College and Columbia Law School. New York shiva, 1:00 - 8:00pm, through Thursday, May 5. Donations to Congregation Kehilath Jeshurun. 1/3
